title: character position in the key
extract: If a special character is assigned to an uppercase or ALT position, the shift or ALT key must be pressed in combination with the key assigned to the special character. The ALT and shift key sequence must be pressed before the entry of each special character.
extract_html: If a special character is assigned to an uppercase or ALT position, the shift or ALT key must be pressed in combination with the key assigned to the special character. The ALT and shift key sequence must be pressed before the entry of each special character.
